name: Hypeteria
description:
Hypeteria is an Arcade game which goal is to collect as much point as you can. There will be a little diamond moving around and 3 tiles below. Remember that you have to activate the tile before the diamond touch it. There are 30 stages and will be randomized.

You can press [A S D] or [J K L] and you can press two of them simultaneously.

If you want to be in the highscore list, you have to login using your gamejolt account.

Enjoy the game!

Play via gamejolt here :
